awful.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He is a pretty awful driver.
The last six months have been awful for her.
I’ve stopped believing most of what he says. Isn’t that awful?
I’m sure Suzy is dead but the awful thing is not knowing how it happened.
awful.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: used to emphasize how much or how good, bad etc something is
awful.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: An awful lot of people  (=a large number of people) died in the war.
He made me feel an awful fool.
awful.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: making you feel great respect or fear
awful.translation[0].note_box[0].items[0: Awful is not used with ‘very’ You say
It was a really awful experience
It was a very awful experience
awful.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: That kid’s awful cute, with her red curls.
